verbs.description: [V: slain] [ARG1: lauderdale lakes] woman family awaits execution of her killer tuesday william frederick happ is scheduled to die by lethal injection at 6 p m tuesday for the 1986 rape and strangulation of a lauderdale lakes woman the 51-year - old painter formerly of gilroy calif angela crowley william frederick happ lauderdale lakes florida bryce crowley murder angie crowley
